channel.title: TIP: Use Link Mode when marking off task lists
channel.description:
Drafts supports [tappable task](http://getdrafts.com/editor/tasks) marks for making quick lists. If you create lists with [ ] / [x] tappable check boxes, like a shopping list, when it comes time to check off items in the list at the store, entering [link mode](http://getdrafts.com/editor/linkmode.html) prevents accidental edits or the keyboard popping up.
![link-mode-for-tasks|690x395](upload://8sdt12bkUz8MCPwI3XwgEPzqLeN.png)
